skills.name: Heavy Cannon
skills.description: Heavy Cannon. Longer charging time. Basic attacks gain 50% Physical DMG.1st Sequence: Single shot.2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.

skills.name: Icebound
skills.description: Hitting an enemy has a 40.0% chance to freeze it for 3s. CD: 9.00s.
